verses.verse: And it came to pass after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Joshua <WH3091>, that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> asked <WH7592> of Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Who shall go up <WH5927> for us first <WH8462> against the Canaanites <WH3669>, to fight against them <WH3898>?
And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, Judah <WH3063> shall go up <WH5927>: behold <WH5414>, I have delivered the land <WH776> into his hand <WH3027>.

And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> unto Simeon <WH8095> his brother <WH251>, Come up <WH5927> with me into my lot <WH1486>, that we may fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites <WH3669>; and I likewise will go <WH1980> with thee into thy lot <WH1486>. So Simeon <WH8095> went with him <WH3212>.

And Judah <WH3063> went up <WH5927>; and Jehovah <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522> into their hand <WH3027>: and they smote <WH5221> of them in Bezek <WH966> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376>.
And they found <WH4672> Adoni-bezek <WH137> in Bezek <WH966>; and they fought <WH3898> against him <WH5221>, and they smote the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522>.
But Adoni-bezek <WH137> fled <WH5127>; and they pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> him <WH270>, and caught him <WH7112>, and cut off his thumbs <WH931> and his great toes <WH7272>.

And Adoni-bezek <WH137> said <WH559>, Threescore and ten <WH7657> kings <WH4428>, having their thumbs <WH931> and their great toes <WH7272> cut off <WH7112>, gathered <WH3950> their food under my table <WH7979>: as I have done <WH6213>, so God <WH430> hath requited <WH7999> me <WH935>. And they brought him to Jerusalem <WH3389>, and he died there <WH4191>.

And the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389>, and took <WH3920> it <WH5221>, and smote it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and set <WH7971> the city <WH5892> on fire <WH784>.

And afterward <WH310> the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> went down <WH3381> to fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> in the hill-country <WH2022>, and in the South <WH5045>, and in the lowland <WH8219>.

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH3212> against the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> in Hebron <WH2275> (now the name <WH8034> of Hebron <WH2275> beforetime <WH6440> was Kiriath-arba <WH7153>); and they smote <WH5221> Sheshai <WH8344>, and Ahiman <WH289>, and Talmai <WH8526>.
And from thence he went <WH3212> against the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir <WH1688>. (Now the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> beforetime <WH6440> was Kiriath-sepher <WH7158>.)
And Caleb <WH3612> said <WH559>, He that smiteth <WH5221> Kiriath-sepher <WH7158>, and taketh <WH3920> it <WH5414>, to him will I give Achsah <WH5915> my daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz <WH7073>, Caleb <WH3612>'s younger <WH6996> brother <WH251>, took <WH3920> it <WH5414>: and he gave him Achsah <WH5915> his daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And it came to pass <WH935>, when she came unto him <WH5496>, that she moved him to ask <WH7592> of her father <WH1> a field <WH7704>: and she alighted <WH6795> from off her ass <WH2543>; and Caleb <WH3612> said unto her <WH559>, What wouldest thou?

And she said <WH559> unto him <WH3051>, Give me a blessing <WH1293>; for that thou hast set <WH5414> me in the land <WH776> of the South <WH5045>, give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water <WH4325>. And Caleb <WH3612> gave <WH5414> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543> and the nether <WH8482> springs <WH1543>.

And the children <WH1121> of the Kenite <WH7017>, Moses <WH4872>' brother-in <WH2859>-law, went up <WH5927> out of the city <WH5892> of palm-trees <WH8558> with the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Judah <WH3063>, which is in the south <WH5045> of Arad <WH6166>; and they went <WH3212> and dwelt <WH3427> with <WH854> the people <WH5971>.

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH3212> with Simeon <WH8095> his brother <WH251>, and they smote <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> that inhabited <WH3427> Zephath <WH6857>, and utterly destroyed <WH2763> it <WH8034>. And the name of the city <WH5892> was called <WH7121> Hormah <WH2767>.
Also Judah <WH3063> took <WH3920> Gaza <WH5804> with the border <WH1366> thereof <WH831>, and Ashkelon with the border <WH1366> thereof <WH6138>, and Ekron with the border thereof <WH1366>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> was with Judah <WH3063>; and drove out <WH3423> the inhabitants of the hill-country <WH2022>; for he could not <WH3808> drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the valley <WH6010>, because they had chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>.
And they gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> unto Caleb <WH3612>, as Moses <WH4872> had spoken <WH1696>: and he drove <WH3423> out thence the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>.

And the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> did not drive out <WH3423> the Jebusites <WH2983> that inhabited <WH3427> Jerusalem <WH3389>; but the Jebusites <WH2983> dwell <WH3427> with the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> in Jerusalem <WH3389> unto this day <WH3117>.
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130>, they also went up <WH5927> against Beth-el <WH1008>; and Jehovah was with them <WH3068>.
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> sent to spy <WH8446> out Beth-el <WH1008>. (Now the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> beforetime <WH6440> was Luz <WH3870>.)

And the watchers <WH8104> saw <WH7200> a man <WH376> come forth <WH3318> out of the city <WH5892>, and they said <WH559> unto him <WH7200>, Show us <WH3996>, we pray thee, the entrance into the city <WH5892>, and we will deal <WH6213> kindly with thee <WH2617>.

And he showed <WH7200> them the entrance <WH3996> into the city <WH5892>; and they smote <WH5221> the city <WH5892> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; but they let the man <WH376> go <WH7971> and all his family <WH4940>.

And the man <WH376> went <WH3212> into the land <WH776> of the Hittites <WH2850>, and built <WH1129> a city <WH5892>, and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> thereof Luz <WH3870>, which is the name <WH8034> thereof unto this day <WH3117>.

And Manasseh <WH4519> did not drive out <WH3423> the inhabitants of Beth-shean <WH1052> and its towns <WH1323>, nor of Taanach <WH8590> and its towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and its towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Ibleam <WH2991> and its towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and its towns <WH1323>; but the Canaanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in that land <WH776>.
And it came to pass <WH3478>, when Israel was waxed strong <WH2388>, that they put <WH7760> the Canaanites <WH3669> to taskwork <WH4522>, and did not utterly <WH3423> drive them out <WH3423>.
And Ephraim <WH669> drove not out <WH3423> the Canaanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> in Gezer <WH1507>; but the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> in Gezer <WH1507> among them <WH7130>.

Zebulun <WH2074> drove not out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Kitron <WH7003>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Nahalol <WH5096>; but the Canaanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> among <WH7130> them <WH4522>, and became subject to taskwork.

Asher <WH836> drove not out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Acco <WH5910>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Sidon <WH6721>, nor of Ahlab <WH303>, nor of Achzib <WH392>, nor of Helbah <WH2462>, nor of Aphik <WH663>, nor of Rehob <WH7340>;
but the Asherites <WH843> dwelt <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites <WH3669>, the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>; for they did not drive them out <WH3423>.

Naphtali <WH5321> drove not out <WH3423> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Beth-shemesh <WH1053>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> of Beth-anath <WH1043>; but he dwelt <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites <WH3669>, the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>: nevertheless the inhabitants <WH3427> of Beth-shemesh <WH1053> and of Beth-anath <WH1043> became subject to taskwork <WH4522>.
And the Amorites <WH567> forced <WH3905> the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> into the hill-country <WH2022>; for they would not suffer <WH5414> them to come down <WH3381> to the valley <WH6010>;

but the Amorites <WH567> would <WH2974> dwell <WH3427> in mount <WH2022> Heres <WH2776>, in Aijalon <WH357>, and in Shaalbim <WH8169>: yet the hand <WH3027> of the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> prevailed <WH3513>, so that they became subject to taskwork <WH4522>.
And the border <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567> was from the ascent <WH4608> of Akrabbim <WH4610>, from the rock <WH5553>, and upward <WH4605>.
